Pre-Game Insights: Canada will enjoy playing in the tournament’s opening match against Argentina on June 20 at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta.
Canada announced its new head coach: former Leeds and RB Leipzig manager Jesse Marsch.
Canada’s star, Bayern Munich’s Alphonso Davies, has won all three matches he has played against Lionel Messi.
With the help of his attacking colleagues, Mallorca’s Cyle Larin and Lille’s Jonathan David, Davies will attempt to extend his winning streak against Messi to 4 out of 4.
Another player to watch is Inter’s Tajon Buchanan, who could be Jesse Marsch’s hidden ace despite getting a few minutes in the Italian league.
